travel_advisories.reason: Recent volcanic activity near Mount Marapi and localized flooding in Sumatra.
travel_advisories.restrictions: Avoid travel within 10 km of active volcano zones.

travel_advisories.reason: Heightened security checks and travel restrictions in Xinjiang and Tibet.
travel_advisories.restrictions: Travel permits required for certain western provinces.

travel_advisories.reason: Low crime rate, stable environment; watch for seasonal typhoons in coastal areas.
Stable political climate with heightened security around major events.
travel_advisories.restrictions: Follow local laws; avoid photographing government buildings.

travel_advisories.reason: Increased risk of kidnapping and terrorism in Mindanao and Sulu Archipelago.
travel_advisories.restrictions: Avoid non-essential travel to southern provinces.

travel_advisories.reason: Security incidents near North Sinai and border areas with Libya and Sudan.
travel_advisories.restrictions: Avoid North Sinai and Western Desert areas.

travel_advisories.reason: Highly safe for travelers; minor disruptions from recent typhoon recovery.
travel_advisories.restrictions: Carry ID; follow local disaster alerts.

travel_advisories.reason: Regional tensions and limited freedom of assembly.
Stable government and infrastructure; bushfire season in some regions.
travel_advisories.restrictions: Monitor fire warnings and air quality updates.

travel_advisories.reason: General safety high; minor transport disruptions from labor strikes.
travel_advisories.restrictions: Plan for delays in rail networks during strikes.

travel_advisories.reason: Political demonstrations and air pollution spikes in Delhi and NCR region.
travel_advisories.restrictions: Avoid protest sites and monitor air quality index (AQI).

travel_advisories.reason: Very low crime; minor dengue outbreak in western districts.
travel_advisories.restrictions: Use mosquito repellent; register travel plans.

travel_advisories.reason: Heightened terrorist threat near Somali border; recent protests in Nairobi.
travel_advisories.restrictions: Avoid border regions and large gatherings.

travel_advisories.reason: Petty crime in urban centers; political rallies in Rio and São Paulo.
travel_advisories.restrictions: Avoid night travel; stay aware in crowded areas.

travel_advisories.reason: Intermittent security operations near the Syrian border and political protests.
travel_advisories.restrictions: Avoid southeastern border provinces; carry ID at all times.
